statements: DELETE FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201 AND satisfaction_score = 5;
DELETE FROM feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 301);
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE satisfaction_score < 4 AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com');
DELETE FROM average_scores WHERE calculation_date < '2021-01-01' AND avg_score > 4.5;
DELETE FROM feedback_table WHERE customer_id = 101 AND satisfaction_score > 3
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 2 AND feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%bad%' AND feedback_date < '2022-03-01';
